00030 #ifndef TERNARYPOINT_H
00031 #define TERNARYPOINT_H
00032 
00033 #include <QtDebug>
00034 #include <QPointF>
00035 
00040 class TernaryPoint
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     TernaryPoint();
00044     TernaryPoint( double a, double b );
00045 
00046     double a() const { return m_a; }
00047     double b() const { return m_b; }
00048     double c() const { return 1.0 - m_a - m_b; }
00049 
00050     void set( double a, double b );
00051 
00052     bool isValid() const;
00053 
00054 private:
00055     double m_a;
00056     double m_b;
00057 };
